content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 the bonjour / hi hat is a super simple and very wearable pattern that knits up quickly with mohair / silk laceweight yarn held double light and airy it s the perfect hat for transitioning from fall into winter and because it practically knits itself you may just want to make a wardrobe of these *show on 22 circumference head * yarn espace tricot halo 72% mohair / 28% silk 459 y 420 m / 50 g 1 skein - shown in bonjour / hi or approximately 257 yds 235 m of a similar laceweight yarn please note that two strands are held together throughout weight of yarns held together is based on gauge and needle size
